nodes.text: High Inquisitor Mox Slosin owned a palace on the planet Urce.
During the Galactic Civil War, High Inquisitor Mox Slosin terrorized the Lesser Plooriod Cluster from his palace on Urce, the capital planet of the area.
Slosin did not spend much time in his palace, however, as he actively patrolled his jurisdiction in his modified Trenchant-class cruiser, the Ironhand, searching out Rebel agents.
